body_html:
Installed tf from source.

Also important is which version you have. I think version 12 of TensorFlow might require cuda 8.0 :(
But if you're installing from source, you should be able to specify cuda 7.5.

You could also try version 11 of TensorFlow, but it will put you a little behind.

body:
> Installed tf from source. 

Also important is which version you have. I think version 12 of TensorFlow might require cuda 8.0 :( 
But if you're installing from source, you should be able to specify cuda 7.5. 

You could also try version 11 of TensorFlow, but it will put you a little behind.
